data.label: LLM Chain
data.name: llmChain
data.description: Chain to run queries against LLMs

inputAnchors.label: Input Moderation
inputAnchors.description: Detect text that could generate harmful output and prevent it from being sent to the language model
inputAnchors.name: inputModeration

data.label: ChatGoogleGenerativeAI
data.name: chatGoogleGenerativeAI
data.description: Wrapper around Google Gemini large language models that use the Chat endpoint

inputParams.label: Connect Credential
inputParams.name: credential
inputParams.description: Google Generative AI credential.

inputParams.label: Top Next Highest Probability Tokens
inputParams.name: topK
inputParams.description: Decode using top-k sampling: consider the set of top_k most probable tokens. Must be positive

inputParams.label: Harm Category
inputParams.name: harmCategory
inputParams.description: Refer to official guide on how to use Harm Category

inputParams.label: Harm Block Threshold
inputParams.name: harmBlockThreshold
inputParams.description: Refer to official guide on how to use Harm Block Threshold

inputParams.label: Allow Image Uploads
inputParams.name: allowImageUploads
inputParams.description: Automatically uses vision model when image is being uploaded from chat. Only works with LLMChain, Conversation Chain, ReAct Agent, and Conversational Agent

outputAnchors.name: chatGoogleGenerativeAI
outputAnchors.label: ChatGoogleGenerativeAI
outputAnchors.description: Wrapper around Google Gemini large language models that use the Chat endpoint

data.label: Prompt Template
data.name: promptTemplate
data.description: Schema to represent a basic prompt for an LLM

inputParams.label: Template
inputParams.name: template
inputParams.placeholder: What is a good name for a company that makes {product}?

inputs.template:
Based on the provided SQL table schema and question below, return a SQL SELECT ALL query that would answer the user's question. For example: SELECT * FROM table WHERE id = '1'.Only return string.
------------
SCHEMA: {schema}
------------
QUESTION: {question}
------------
SQL QUERY:

outputAnchors.name: promptTemplate
outputAnchors.label: PromptTemplate
outputAnchors.description: Schema to represent a basic prompt for an LLM

inputParams.label: Input Variables
inputParams.name: functionInputVariables
inputParams.description: Input variables can be used in the function with prefix $. For example: $var

data.label: IfElse Function
data.name: ifElseFunction
data.description: Split flows based on If Else javascript functions

inputParams.label: Input Variables
inputParams.name: functionInputVariables
inputParams.description: Input variables can be used in the function with prefix $. For example: $var

inputParams.label: If Function
inputParams.name: ifFunction
inputParams.description: Function must return a value

inputParams.label: Else Function
inputParams.name: elseFunction
inputParams.description: Function must return a value

inputParams.label: Input Variables
inputParams.name: functionInputVariables
inputParams.description: Input variables can be used in the function with prefix $. For example: $var

data.label: Prompt Template
data.name: promptTemplate
data.description: Schema to represent a basic prompt for an LLM

inputParams.label: Template
inputParams.name: template
inputParams.placeholder: What is a good name for a company that makes {product}?

inputs.template:
Based on the question, and SQL response, write a natural language response, be details as possible:
------------
QUESTION: {question}
------------
SQL RESPONSE: {sqlResponse}
------------
NATURAL LANGUAGE RESPONSE:
tambahkan juga query sql dieksekusi:

outputAnchors.name: promptTemplate
outputAnchors.label: PromptTemplate
outputAnchors.description: Schema to represent a basic prompt for an LLM
